storyInfo: A Zalak with a red tail walks about the Grand Knight Territory. An Infected with a red tail attempts to change lives. A Knight with a red tail—has become a leader.

attributes.content: Fifteen knights, fifteen chances to take first prize!
attributes.name: Major Commentator

attributes.content: Who's the Knight tonight?! Who are you betting on?! And who's going to walk out of the bloodbath with a handful of gold? Who'll stride through the storm to win our admiration?!
attributes.name: Major Commentator

attributes.content: We're ten minutes away from the official start of the match! Don't miss this chance to get filthy rich overnight! You'd only end up kicking yourself! Now let's witness the birth of a rising star!
attributes.name: Major Commentator

attributes.content: What's your name?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Do you need something?
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: C'mon, drop the act for a minute. It's not every day you see a Zalak knight around here, so I'm just popping over to say hi, that's all.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Nervous?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Are you... Infected too?
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: I mean, who wouldn't be? Only Infected would fight a match like this... our lives are a goddamned game here.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What'cha staring at me for? Spooky.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's just... you seem a little... familiar.
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: Mmm? Trying to cozy up to me?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No. Maybe you're right about Zalak knights... being pretty uncommon.
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: Well, since life's bundled us together, how about we team up?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: Quit playing around. I'm in this to—
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: To give the knight nobility a little hands-on knock-knock?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...How do you...
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: Got it in your eyes.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's too obvious. There's disdain, there's anger, and they've been your bywords for a little too long—those couple of bigshot knights up in the stands, they're beginning to notice you, y'know?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: This place isn't worth that.
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: Don't jump to conclusions, okay... take a look around. What are the different kinds of Infected knights around here?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Some bought up by the big shots as a little gambling pastime. There's a share in it for them if they make it, and if they lose, hoo boy, let's not get into that.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Of course, you've got some anonymous nobodies, thirsty for a real-ass high-riding knight or some merchant to pick them out. Thirsty to become... a tool.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: They've got no other way. Infected never get any other way.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What are you getting at?
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: C'mon. Let's team up, okay?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Your chances in a melee, see, they're always better with a little personal alliancing, y'know?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So why do you want to win, then? For the prize money?
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: No. Because I can't let anyone else win.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: —The hell.
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: There's something going on behind this match. A couple Infected... I'm not too sure yet, but my worry's they've 'settled on it,' so to speak.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: They've decided to trample the others, haul themselves on up, for better odds of survival.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The only real choice, right? Too real for plenty here to not be thinking it.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: —That's why I can't let them win. If someone wins, someone loses. Big whoop. But if someone's living, then... someone's dying.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: A vague sense of justice isn't gonna win you much trust.
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: But—sure. Right now is make-or-break for Knights Association approval...
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: I'm in. Zalak and Zalak. Beats teaming with some rando any day.
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: Eh? For real?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If you just came over to screw with me, then I'm gonna start with you.
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: Whoa, whoa, whoa, no, I'm real. Let's take this melee together, Ashley.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Greynuty Kaliska.
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: ...Kaliska...?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Joke of a surname. Just pretend you don't know, even if you've heard it before.
attributes.name: An Indifferent Knight

attributes.content: Now! Let's welcome—
attributes.name: Major Commentator

attributes.content: You can call me Sona, Ashley.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Sona.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Mmm? What's up?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Back then, at the end, you took my points out of nowhere, didn't you?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: ...Ahaha... Ashley, c'mon... that was, uh...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: C'mon, are you still not over that?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Don't you think I might be a little stuck on it?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But not because you stole the crown from me.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You said you couldn't let anyone else win... and I was just the same.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What are you overreacting for? We'd only just met then. It's normal not to trust.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: No, well... uh... actually, yeah...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Look, weren't we going to see how the Infected ghetto was doing? Let's move.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Allow me! To come up with an excuse! To restore our bonds of Knightclub trust—!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Since when were we in a Knightclub?!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: ...Heh.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Since sooner or later, Ashley.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You mean... that Knightclub for Infected?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I came from around Victoria, if you're curious. Plenty of that sort of pine tree around, back when I was young. These days they're long gone, though.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Pinus sylvestris? Pinus... sylvestris...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You were one of those Zalaks who got hit by that Catastrophe?! You got left for dead by the knights too—the Kaliskas abandoned you...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Let it go, Ashley. It's bygone stuff.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But... then your infection was... my family's fault?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Didn'tcha already break from your family? They don't count as family anymore, then.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You're not feeling any guilt for me, not on my watch. Oh, right, weren't you just talking about how I stole your championship?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We're even.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So you're... 'Flametail' Sona?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You know me, then.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Haha, not many Infected around who win knight titles. I know them all.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: So Pinus Sylvestris is led by the one and only 'Flametail' Sona... that puts me at ease, then.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You look after those kids?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I do. Er, but I only took them in... and a couple of them aren't Infected, actually. I was gonna send them to an aid station somewhere.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: So I can't come along for the ride. Sorry, Flametail.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Can I get your name, at least?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Jamie. Call me Jamie.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Jamie, then. You said you know a couple Infected knights?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Every Infected keeping up the independent fight is an ally in waiting.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I remember one making a big splash lately... a Liberi, a sniper.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You're right, and there's a Kuranta... she's 'Leader' to a couple Infected knights, and to others, 'Wild Mane.'
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: ...*Spit*.
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: Yo, Iwona. Tired?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hey there, Sona.
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: You, uh... seem pretty smooth rolling, still. Strong stuff.
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: Not really. Just... always gotta keep up some of the lax act.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You tired too? Didn't know you felt it. Figured you were always like that, on the forward march.
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: Ahaha...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hah. That proves you trust me, though. Looking that beat in front of me.
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: So, this, uh... Armorless Union biz. How do we deal with 'em?
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: Do everything we can to keep them from knowing where exactly the Infected are settled.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So long as they hide in the city, an Infected's got nowhere to go.
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: We'll get found sooner or later, Sona. This isn't gonna solve anything.
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: You need to think of some way—
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: Mmm.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: —Nah, maybe we oughtn'ta dump everything on your back. I'm sorry.
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: Yeah, chewing over stuff like this isn't my style, but you oughtn'ta run your own load too heavy, Sona. We're here for you.
attributes.name: A Wild Knight

attributes.content: Mmm!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: She's an Infected, isn't she? How'd she get so many points...?
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight A

attributes.content: Not just that, Night of Knights had a whole spread for her interview a few days ago!
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight B

attributes.content: They either take underground fights for money, or uncompenasted battles just to get a title from the Association. How do Infected like her even survive?
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight A

attributes.content: So that's Justyna?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: She looks frail as a twig. Where's the skill?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You ever hear the one about books and covers?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But the papers haven't, uh... been duly proper to her lately.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: How many times have they ever been proper to Infected?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Actually, forget Infected. When have the media ever cared about being fair to anyone?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Can we believe anything that Armorless goon said?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's something to go off. Beats having no ideas at all.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: What's our plan?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: That's what I'm talking about—Justyna! Get that Feather Knight!
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight

attributes.content: To the left! Behind the stone bunker! Yeah! That's it—no, no! Don't peek out, you'll be clocked—nooo!
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight

attributes.content: She's pretty popular, huh.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Might not wanna join us?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: If she keeps doing what she's doing, she'll be titled sooner or later. Make a killing riding the wave of popularity, and maybe she can go find somewhere quiet to live out her days.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: If she's that kind of Infected, can we really talk them into helping us?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We can't talk anyone over.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But this city forces Infected to make a choice in the end.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Honestly, it might just force everyone.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I hardly ever see you this pessimistic.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You're the one who asked!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I'm here hoping the Flametail Knight'll declare to me 'no problem, it's all under control.'
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: ...haha.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No problem... it's all under control.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Shh—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Still not certain.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Besides, it's still ambiguous how the Adeptus treat Infected.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: How would any of those knight families give a thought for the Infected?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We're just outsiders to them. They'd never let us get away.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: No matter how arrogant they are, I'd still take five hundred of them over the K.G.C.C. Dumb shameless assholes.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You've got a soft spot for campaign knights.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ha, they're the knights who fought Ursus off the grasslands! Tops clowns on stage winning points with the audience any day!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: ...Ursus. All I know of them is the news I saw when I was young...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Ursus lost their war with Higashi. Of course the knights cranked up the publicity machine.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You... know about the war between Ursus and Higashi too?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Hey, they forced me to read a dead tree or two when I was young. It was all stuff on the modern history of the campaign knights.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I can't imagine it.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Iwona sitting at a table, holding a book. It's too farfetched. Inconceivable.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You're from a campaign knight family, I think?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Studying's not... outta the question... for you, I guess, haha...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Keh! Is this how you all see me?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ten years after the Tenth Kazimierz-Ursus War, the Emperor of Ursus got seriously sick, and everything annexed from Kazimierz fell into the nobles' hands.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The crown prince picked up on the corruption inside the military even before succession, goading two Armies to rise up, as a distraction.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: No way the Ursus nobles could ever agree on one plan, but they were all born and raised in this nation of chaos. They sent their own forces out against Higashi without any argument, so they could cover up their own crimes...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Which led to Higashi launching an attack of their own on Ursus far beyond what anyone expected, and in the end, the decisive battle took place inside Ursus territory.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Jeez. Didn't know you had straight history lectures in you, Iwona.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No clarification on those bits that obviously got mixed in.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: At that point in Kazimierz, a good deal of the knights thought they should strike while Ursus was up to their ears in it, and in all the unrest, they'd take back the cities they lost ten years ago...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...and that was 1072. 25 years ago.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: My grandparents were there with the scouts who resisted Ursus, only to get strangled by the Army before they could really rise up. I wish I got to know them.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hey, don't take it so hard. That's the past. I'm not a campaign knight anymore, so I jump when you say jump, Sona.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Enough about me. Let's talk your plans now.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: This morning, Jamie got three, maybe four new Infected in on his end.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Miners, infected in a small industrial accident, but the contractor declined to reimburse their medical fees, so with nowhere to go, they ended up with the police out for them.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And that's not the end... we've had over ten normal Infected join us this month already, right?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: They live in the darkest, dankest corners of the Grand Knight Territory... we've got no way to settle them.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Sona.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We've still got time. We've got power. We'll find a way.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But... I won't... let any innocent Infected end up risking themselves with us.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If the Adeptus really will let us all have legal identities again, live on in Kazimierz, then—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: —Man, this is some party.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Flametail Knight, Sona.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: You are suspected of illegally harboring Infected, publicly violating the Knights Association's code of conduct. Put an end to your resistance.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Hand over the illegal Infected, and we will report your case to the Knights Association.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Musta missed this. Armorless have authority to help settle biz for the police and knights now?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Let's all be honest. Don't you guys feel ashamed when you use the law as this big pompous excuse?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Your provocations will get you nowhere, Flametail Knight.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: You have already overstepped the mark. Here in the Grand Knight Territory, drawing the Chamber's gaze is tantamount to death.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Death? That's some scary stuff there.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: A biological death is not death's only sense, Flametail Knight.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: The more chances for survival Kazimierz accords us, the more deaths it creates for us down the line.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: All hands, take aim!
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: —Shelling from the rear?!
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Sona! I'm here!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: It's backup from Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub! Surround them!
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Justyna!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Roger. Laying cover fire.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Sorry, Sona, I'm going in!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Do Infected cry?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Infected. I don't mean the knights who had the guts to resist the Chamber. I mean all the normal Infected.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: They just got Oripathy, right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Er... yes?
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: They're not monsters. And they're not scum of the earth either.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I'm not all that into this assignment.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Don't ever let the Lazurites hear you say that!
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: But still, have you found some sort of compassion for them, Platinum?
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Huh. Compassion... not really, I guess. I don't even get the time for myself, after all.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Compassion's a luxury kinda deal these days.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I've got other assignments. Dealing with the Infected is pretty small-time. You guys have it.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what tantrums Adeptus throws at the K.G.C.C., neither's gonna wanna keep Infected in the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The nobles aren't gonna care whether Infected live or die, are they?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...How the...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Flametail!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: It's the Armorless... the Armorless suddenly attacked us!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Stay calm. What went down?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: They sealed off the street nearby two hours ago. We were busted long ago. And then they... used gas to force us out of the houses...!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: A few knights picked up on it. They used their own bodies to block the Armorless's shots, but some still...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Where...?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Where do we go next? If the Armorless Union got us the first time, they'll get us the second, the third... we...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Save the eulogies. First, we need to... move the rest of the Infected.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Should we get out of the Grand Knight Territory? Go somewhere in the countryside...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: At least! At least get the Infected civilians out of here—
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: We've been leaning on our knighthood so hard to give them some kind of cover.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: When there's no knighthood involved, when they're out of the Grand Knight Territory, it's only gonna get worse for them...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: So we just... take it?! We give up and accept this?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: ...The Adeptus.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We still have... that on the table, don't we.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I'm back.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: How was it?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I was dealing with an old knight... Definitely one of the Adeptus higher-ups, no doubt about it.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Best we don't trust the Grand Knight Territory nobles too hard, Sona.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: It was Demian... vice-president of the Knights Association.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ha, there's a big guy for you. VP Demian, the renowned campaign knight.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I remember him. Huge ruckus for the news when he was discharged and came back to the Territory to do boring old civil service.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: A descendant of the heroes, like that one Maria girl.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: And the conditions...?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: If you're back here, that means there's been actual headway, correct? What conditions did the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi set?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: A separation. A Great Separation.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: He wants to borrow our efforts... to put this city... to sleep.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Uh. What's that mean?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: That's how the plan goes, roughly.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We can do this... right?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Are you asking me?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Maybe. I'm not giving up until I see those dumb knight nobles bowing to me.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You guys?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Real simple plan. We fail if we're not strong enough. We get even stronger next time, we're good.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Long as we don't die, yeah?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: ...Relax. Uncoil, don't get nervous.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris just needs to stay Pinus Sylvestris... and we'll be fine.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Whether or not we succeed, we only have one way open to us. There's no difference, really.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: ...Difference, huh.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You've been zoning out a lot lately. What's wrong?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Nah... nothing, really.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Let's go. We've gotta find a place for the Infected, still.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Run away... hurry!
Away from the sawdust... fire everywhere... chokes your sinuses... the soil's too hot to touch...
Ore... Originium... gashing...
The Kaliskas abandoned their subjects—
(Did I... fall asleep? On a bench?)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ashley'd be on my case again if she was sitting here.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Lot of people... out on the street.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (Infected under the Knights Association's supervision aren't allowed to walk around freely.)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (If all these pedestrians... knew there was an Infected out in broad moonlight here, I wonder what they'd think?)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Without knowing why, a thought flits through Sona's mind.
'They wouldn't think much.'
Pedestrians bustle, coming and going as life demands, melting together under the rainbow lights.
The Zalak called 'Flametail' silently watches the city before her.
Hm? Oh, hey, it's Ashley. What's up—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Trouble! Sona, they found the underground shelter!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We're not gonna make it in time to move everyone! Whoever we save, we save! Hurry, get back—
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: This is an Infected...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Right here!
attributes.name: Sona
